TradesService

TradesService class

A service that handles trade-related operations via the Haveno gRPC API.

This service allows you to perform various trade-related actions, such as fetching trade data, sending chat messages, confirming payments, and more. It uses the HavenoChannel for gRPC communication and provides error handling via the GrpcErrorHandler mixin.
